languages.text: "Лорд-капитан лично посещает грузовую магистраль... Говорит с нижайшими из серфов... Воистину, мне пора в отставку!"
"A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан лично посещает грузовую магистраль... Говорит с нижайшими из серфов... Воистину, мне пора в отставку!"

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain, gracing the freight line with a visit... Speaking to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never seemed more tempting!"
"The Lord Captain, gracing the freight line with a visit... Speaking to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never seemed more tempting!"
"A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

"A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

languages.text: "Ein Lord Captain, der die Güterstrecke mit Besuchen beehrt und mit den niedersten aller Sklaven spricht ... Der Ruhestand klang noch nie so verlockend!"
languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Lord Captain, der die Güterstrecke mit Besuchen beehrt und mit den niedersten aller Sklaven spricht ... Der Ruhestand klang noch nie so verlockend!"

languages.text: « {mf|Un seigneur-capitaine|Une seigneure-capitaine} qui honore de sa présence la ligne de fret et adresse la parole aux plus humbles ouvriers... La retraite ne m'avait encore jamais paru aussi tentante ! »
languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un seigneur-capitaine|Une seigneure-capitaine} qui honore de sa présence la ligne de fret et adresse la parole aux plus humbles ouvriers... La retraite ne m'avait encore jamais paru aussi tentante ! »

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán dignándose a conceder su presencia a la línea de carga y hablar con los sirvientes más insignificantes... ¡Qué tentadora es la jubilación!».
languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán dignándose a conceder su presencia a la línea de carga y hablar con los sirvientes más insignificantes... ¡Qué tentadora es la jubilación!».

languages.text: 「貨物線を訪問し、最も身分の低い農奴に話しかけるロード・キャプテン…。引退がこれほど魅力的に聞こえるとは！」
languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

traits.locale_text: 「貨物線を訪問し、最も身分の低い農奴に話しかけるロード・キャプテン…。引退がこれほど魅力的に聞こえるとは！」

languages.text: “舰长大人亲自去了货运区域，还和最底层的农奴谈话……感觉真是想让人赶紧早点退休！”
languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人亲自去了货运区域，还和最底层的农奴谈话……感觉真是想让人赶紧早点退休！”

languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

languages.text: "Yük hattını ziyaretiyle kutsayıp en alt tabakadaki köleleriyle bile konuşan bir Lord Kaptan... Emeklilik, gözüme hiç bu kadar cazip görünmemişti!"
languages.original_text: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"
